alert.note: Alert for Howard; Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 15 at 3:05PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central Nebraska, including the following counties, Howard, Merrick and Nance. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...River flows are elevated due to ice jamming along the North Loup River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 301 PM CST, emergency management reported a buildup of ice near the Highway 281 bridge. If this persists, this may lead to minor flooding of surrounding areas, including the Lake of the Woods area north of St. Paul. - Some locations that will experience flooding include...Lake of the Woods and other rural areas along the North Loup River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
